borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size: 11pt;">8. The hours of operation of the site are restricted to&nbsp;Monday to Friday 8am - 6pm, Saturday 9am - 4pm and Sundays and Bank Holidays 12pm - 5pm only. No operations shall occur outside of these hours.</span><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><em>Reason - To prevent any significant disturbance to residents of nearby properties.</em></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt;">7.&nbsp;Prior to occupation of the approved development, cycle parking facilities shall be designed and laid out in accordance with the London Cycle Design Standards. The development shall not be occupied until the approved details have been implemented. Thereafter, the cycle parking facilities shall be permanently retained.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt;">Reason: promote alternative, sustainable forms of transport, in accordance with The Local Plan (2021, reg 19) policy DMT 3 and The London Plan 2021 policy T5.</span><br></p><p><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><b><i>Secure by design </i><o:p></o:p></b></p><p class="MsoNormal">The proposed development shall achieve a Certificate of
Compliance in respect of the Secured by Design scheme. Or alternatively achieve
security standards (based on Secured by Design principles) to the satisfaction
of the local authority &amp; Metropolitan Police, details of which shall be
provided to the Local Planning Authority for its written approval prior to the
first occupation of the approved development. All security measures applied to
the approved development shall be permanently retained thereafter.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></p><p>



</p><p class="MsoNormal"><em><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-bidi">REASON: To ensure safe and
secure development and reduce crime<o:p></o:p></span></em></p>

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Change of use from Retail (Use Class E) to a Vehicle Rental Premises (sui generis) including an office, wash bay, car parking and rental vehicle storage

constraints_details.result: Carpet Sense, 421 Becontree Avenue, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM8 3UH
